sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-form ref="infoForm" :rules="rules" :model="infoDetail" label-width="100px" class="box-card">
        <el-form-item label="学号" prop="sId">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.sId"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="学生姓名" prop="sName">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.sName"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="性别" prop="gender">
            <el-select v-model="infoDetail.gender" placeholder="请选择性别">
                <el-option v-for="item in genderList" :key="item.gender" :label="item.description" :value="item.gender">
                </el-option>
            </el-select>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="密码" prop="password">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.password"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="毕业年份" prop="graduationYear">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.graduationYear"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="学院" prop="college">
            <el-select v-model="infoDetail.college" placeholder="请选择学院">
                <el-option v-for="item in collegeList" :key="item.college_id" :label="item.description"
                    :value="item.college_id">
                </el-option>
            </el-select>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="专业" prop="major">
            <el-select v-model="infoDetail.major" placeholder="请选择专业">
                <el-option v-for="item in majorList" :key="item.major_id" :label="item.description"
                    :value="item.major_id">
                </el-option>
            </el-select>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="手机号" prop="phone">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.phone"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="邮箱" prop="email">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.email"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="课题名称" v-if="formType === '1'">
            <el-input disabled v-model="infoDetail.topicName"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>

        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>
            <el-row>
                <el-button plain type="primary" class="info_btns" v-if="formType === '0'"
                    @click="submitForm('infoForm')">新增
                </el-button>

                <el-button plain type="primary" class="info_btns" v-else @click="submitForm('infoForm')">提交修改
                </el-button>

                <el-button plain type="danger" class="info_btns">取消</el-button>

            </el-row>


        </el-form-item>
    </el-form>

</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "FormStuInfo",
    props: ["formType", "sId"],
    data() {
        return {
            infoDetail: {
                sId: '',
                sName: "",
                gender: "",
                password: "",
                graduationYear: "",
                college: "",
                major: "",
                phone: "",
                email: "",
                topicName: '无'
            },
            genderList: [
                { gender: 0, description: '未知' },
                { gender: 1, description: '男' },
                { gender: 2, description: '女' },
            ],
            collegeList: [
                { college_id: '01', description: '信息与通信工程学院' },
                { college_id: '02', description: '土木学院' },
                { college_id: '03', description: '艺术学院' },
            ],
            majorList: [
                { major_id: '0101', description: '计算机科学与技术' },
                { major_id: '0102', description: '软件工程' },
                { major_id: '0103', description: '通信工程' },
            ],



            rules: {
                sId: [
                    { required: true, message: '学号不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                sName: [
                    { required: true, message: '学生姓名不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                gender: [
                    { required: true, message: '请选择学生性别', trigger: 'change' },
                ],
                password: [
                    { required: true, message: '密码不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                graduationYear: [
                    { required: true, message: '毕业年份不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                college: [
                    { required: true, message: '请选择学院', trigger: 'change' },
                ],
                major: [
                    { required: true, message: '请选择专业名称', trigger: 'change' },
                ],
                phone: [
                    { required: true, message: '请输入手机号', trigger: 'blur' },
                    { length: 11, message: '手机号长度为11位', trigger: 'blur' }
                ],
                email: [
                    { required: true, message: '请输入邮箱账号', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],

            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        submitForm(formName) {
            this.$refs[formName].validate((valid) => {
                if (valid) {
                    alert('submit!');
                    // 发送请求
                } else {
                    console.log('error submit!!');
                    return false;
                }
            });
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped lang="less">
.info_btns {
    margin-left: 200px;
    
}

.box-card {
    height: 818px;
    line-height: 23px;
    font-size: 22px;
    text-align: left;

}
</style>
